runs.comm: was that a statement from Tamim? He charges down the track first ball... does not middle this as mid-off hunts it down
darted on the pads, Tamim half-pulls and half-flicks it away behind square on the leg side. Good executution
banged in short on middle, not much sting in it either. Tamim waits on the back foot, pulling to deep midwicket
Anamul inches forward and dabs this back-of-a-length ball towards point
full and angled in, clipped to the right of midwicket

overpitched and outside off, drilled to the covers, where Raza makes a tumbling save to his right. Tamim and Anamul scamper across. Sharp work from Chakabva as well to run Anamul out. He has a wry smile as he departs. The throw was wide after Raza recovered and gathered the ball, but Chakabva under-armed it to disturb the furniture
back of a length and on off, manipulated to mid-on with the wrists
short and speared down leg, poor line.. and the extra bounce beats the keeper as well
Sabbir camps back and forces this one to the covers
a touch overpitched and on off, thrashed straight down the ground to the left of the bowler
width outside off, slapped to cover
full ball on off, which is driven on the up to mid-off
punched towards the covers from an off-stump line
back of a length and outside off, jabbed to the covers
Panyangara errs too full and that's heaved over midwicket
back of a length and on off, turned through midwicket
really full and angled in, almost a yorker-length delivery, jammed out towards point
Tamim advances but the bowler hammers it short and finds extra bounce as well to leave Tamim swiping and missing
low full toss on off, flicked straight to midwicket. Tamim should have placed that better
whipped away behind square on the leg side
dragged down leg, wide
full and on middle, punchily driven to mid-off
a wild swing and a miss outside off
pitched up on off, Tamim drills a drive to long-off
back of a length and on middle, Sabbir ventures across off, eyes a lap-scoop but can only top-edge it in front of short third man. He almost did a Chakabva there
full ball outside off, Sabbir goes hard on a drive and finds mid-off
length ball on middle, slugged to midwicket
loopy slower ball outside off, Sabbir reads this and carves it over the covers. He taps gloves with Tamim
back of a length and on off, helped down the ground for one
Tamim loads up for another of those big swipes, he ends up french-cutting it away past the leg stump to fine leg
Tamim comes down the track and manufactures room outside leg but the bowler chases him with a yorker. Tamim adjusts and squeezes it behind square on the leg side for the third four of the over
Ervine hangs on and that's a brilliant catch. Touch short on middle, Sabbir pulls as Ervine completes a diving catch
worked to midwicket
Mushfiq comes down and yorks himself but digs it out
short ball, pulled through midwicket, though not firmly
flattish and outside off, punched down to long-on
Tamim runs down the pitch, Cremer digs short and keeps him quiet
Cremer turns to a googly outside off, Tamim waits on the back foot, late-cutting it towards third man. Madziva chases and scoops the ball back in, saving a run for his side
flighted on middle, Mushfiq bends low and sweeps over backward square leg
flatter and on middle, reverse swept now, through backward point
fired on leg, Tamim attempts a slog sweep and drags it behind square off the inside half of the bat
dropped short and outside off, Mushfiq makes a mess of the pull. He lets it balloon into the hands of Raza at short cover off a top edge
extra bounce, kicks up outside off, beaten on the cut
tossed up on middle, straight-bat push down to long-on
deft little late cut to third man
flat and on the pads, clipped to short fine leg
Cremer creates another chance. Tamim skips down and skies it. Chisoro runs in from long-off, dives forward, but is nowhere near it
short, pulled to deep midwicket off the back foot
punched down to long-on for one
sliding down leg, wide
quicker legbreak, add extra bounce as well. Tamim drops back and chops it towards covers
fired on middle and leg, Tamim forces it to long-on
Nasir uses his feet, manufactures a half-volley and eases it to long-off for one
Nasir welcomes him into the attack with a lusty club over wide long-on. This was really full and smashed with a slog-sweep
tap and run to covers for one. Smart stuff
nudged off the pads through square leg
drifts in on middle, worked down the ground, mid-on flings to his left and fields
Nasir advances and goes inside out over cover
tossed up and full on off, Nasir drives wide of the covers for four
Cremer sends Nasir back with a googly. He doesn't pick it and is trapped in front. Nasir played back and missed the flick
steered to backward point

Tamim half-waves his bat to the umpire but is given out lbw. Straight ball from Cremer, Tamim, who hangs back, now fails to defend and is rapped on the pad in front of middle. Key, key wicket. Zimbabwe are very much in this contest
slides on quick and flat, blocked from the crease
darted flat, near yorker. Jabbed back
tapped to backward point as this was tossed up on off
full and on off, driven in the air, and bursts through the hands of a leaping cover
cracked through the covers
poked back to the bowler
full and on off, eased to deep cover
flatter and on off, flicked through midwicket
skiddy ball on off, punchily played in front of midwicket
drifting down leg, Liton just helps it with the angle, fine of short fine leg
a run-out chance. Liton throws himself onto the ground and completes two, beating the direct hit from Madziva. Gently tapped through square leg
legbreak on a length and on off, dabbed to short third man
pushed outside off, angled to the right of short third man
nicely flighted on middle, tucked to the right of midwicket
good length and on off, guided through covers
extra bounce and zips through outside off, left alone
clipped off the pads behind square on the leg side
this one kicks up as well outside off, Liton rides the bounce and steers it to the third-man boundary
round-armish ball on middle and leg, nudged in front of midwicket
he goes wide of the crease and angles it outside off, deflected to third man
short ball on off, Mahmudullah sits back and defends it to Panyangara
drifting onto the pads, Mahmudullah can't glance this away... But Panyangara has overstepped by a long margin
yorker on off, jabbed to midwicket
lifter down the leg side, wide called. 13th extra of the innings
back of a length, swung away over backward square leg
fractionally short on off, late dab to third man.
wide full toss outside off, Mahmudllah bends his knee and sends it skimming over cover
full and on middle and leg, Mahmudullah gets another four. This one via an inside edge that runs away past the leg stump
Chisoro's extra bounce undoes Liton. This one gets big on Liton, who tunes up for a cut, but ends up looping it to short third man off a top edge
full and pushed through on middle, worked to midwicket
straight ball on off, defended back to the bowler
slid short and outside off, cut straight to cover
another quick, flat one. Mashrafe answers with a front-foot defence
Chisoro gives this more air outside off to round off a wicket maiden. Mashrafe hangs back and glides it to short third man, all along the ground, though
too full and outside off, driven crisply to Ervine at deep cover
full ball on off, that's pushed back to the bowler
short and on middle and leg, Mashrafe gets inside the line and helps it fine with a pull
dug in again, pulled powerfully to deep midwicket
Madziva persists with the shorter length, swivel-pulled behind square
low full toss on off, (mis)hit back to the bowler
full and on middle, dabbed in front of midwicket. Jongwe gets across quickly but can't throw the stumps down at the non-strikers' end
full and on the pads, Mashrafe can't connect with a flick
short on the leg from round the wicket, pulled away, fine leg had no chance. The crowd dancing and jiving to their captain's tune
Mashrafe finishes it off with a six! Length ball, Mashrafe sizes it up and launches it down the ground to put the seal on Bangladesh's win
